alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 24 at 12:05PM AKDT until July 25 at 2:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM AKDT TUESDAY FOR LIGHTNING ACROSS THE COPPER RIVER BASIN FROM GLENNALLEN NORTH... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 3 PM this afternoon to 2 AM AKDT Tuesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Timing...From 3pm today through early Tuesday morning. * Location...From Glennallen to Chistochina and areas north and east in the Copper River Basin. * Lightning Activity Level...4. * Winds...Light and variable winds to 8 mph. * Relative Humidity...38 to 45 percent. * Temperatures...In the upper 70s to lower 80s. * Impacts...Ample lightning could lead to numerous new fire starts.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
